message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of income arising in the course of the entity's core operating activities from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, the main revenue from core operations is represented by "Main Business Revenue" which is the income generated from the entity's primary business activities.

In the given problem, the value of "Main Business Revenue" is 3397619.40 as of 2024-02-05.

This is the value I need to extract as it represents the income arising from the entity's core operating activities.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3397619.40'}}
```
